It is the longest river in the world

answers: To increase the hours of the day

questions.questions: These are places of arid land with really low rainfall and high tempertures variation. Their vegetation is insignificant and the population of people and animals is very limited.
This is a gemstone made by fossilized tree sap that is at least 30 million years old.
This is the largest island on Earth and one third of it is a national park.

The main function of this organ of respiration is to transport oxygen from the atmosphere into the bloodstream.
This gland is shaped like a butterfly and helps regulate energy in the body.
The cerebellum section of the brain controls the fine movement and equilibrium, among other things.
These organs are very sensitive and often fail in people with very high blood pressure or diabetes.
Tooth enamel is the hardest substance in the body.

This doctor takes care of you and your baby during pregnancy.

The mother determines the sex of the baby.

These small bodies are considered left overs from the formation of the Solar system some 4.6 billion years ago.
These are lumps of ice and dust.  When they get close enough to the Sun they gradually evaporate.  Jets of gas and dust create long tails that people can see from Earth.
This planet is slightly smaller than Earth and its closest neighbor (excluding the Moon).
This planet is has the largest  group of moons - 31, but it is best known for its ring system.
This planet of the Solar System was named after a Greek god of the sea and earthquakes. The name is actually the Roman translation of the gods name.
As this is the closest planet to the Sun, its temperatures at the surface range between -300 and 800 F (hot enough for lead to melt).
The surface of this planet is unique, it is the only one which has water in large quantities.

This is the largest planet in our solar system. It is most famous for its Great Red Spot.
Miranda, Ariel, Umbriel, Titania, Oberon, Caliban, and Sycorax are names of the icy moons of this planet.
The popular chat room abbreviation asl or a/s/l stands for age, sex, and location.
An icon or animation to represent a participant used in Internet chat and games is referred to as this.
If you and I are chatting over the Internet and I write LOL, that means that I am doing this.
The terms smiley and emoticon refer to one and the same thing.

answers: TTYL - To Tell You a Lie

questions.questions: One of these things will not help you to get in touch with your neighbours PC.

The medical term cardio, deriving from a Greek word, refers to which organ of the human body?
The term arthro is of Greek origin. It refers to which part of the body?

The word hepato, which derives from Greek, refers to the kidney.
Erythrocytes are a type of blood cells, consisting mainly of hemoglobin. What does the word erythro mean?
The term thrombo, which comes from Greek, refers to a blood clot.
